greeting.name: Vinicius Diniz
greeting.description: I have a degree in Information Systems and am currently finishing a post-graduate degree in Cybersecurity. I have experience in IT infrastructure. Currently, I am focusing on Back-End Development with Java and Spring Boot, after completing a course at SENAI Maracan√£, while improving my Front-End skills with a focus on the Angular framework, among others.
greeting.description2: I have a strong passion for games, which leads me to adopt a detailed and creative approach to software development. I am always looking for new challenges that allow me to expand my knowledge and contribute to innovative projects.
greeting.description3: Former Naval Infantry, I developed leadership, resilience, and teamwork skills, applied in the professional environment to face challenges and collaborate effectively in high-performance teams.
